item.title: Amazon launches fixed pricing for treatment of conditions such as hair loss. Hims & Hers stock drops 15%
item.description: Amazon announced Prime members can access new upfront pricing for treatment of five common conditions such as erectile disfunction and men's hair loss...

item.title: European markets rise 1%; loss-making Burberry jumps 18% after unveiling overhaul plan
item.description: European markets moved higher Thursday as traders assessed the global inflation outlook and the possible trajectory of central bank rate cuts.

item.title: Embattled fashion house Burberry reveals massive overhaul sending shares to an all-time high
item.description: Burberry is aiming to boost waning sales by refocusing on heritage designs and statement pieces under sweeping revamp plans announced Thursday.

item.title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: India's growing wealth divide
item.description: India's income gap (which is the difference in wages earned between different demographic) comes alongside a worsening wealth divide too.

item.title: The Onion wins Alex Jones' Infowars in bankruptcy auction
item.description: The satirical news company plans to shutter Jonesâ€™ InfoWars and rebuild the website featuring well-known internet humor writers and content creators, ...
